title: Day 54: The Tribe of Levi (2022)
author: Ascension
itunes:author: Ascension
itunes:subtitle: Fr. Mike clarifies some questions surrounding the Tribe of Levi and talks about what it means to be held to a higher standard as a leader in your community. Numbers 3, Deuteronomy 3, and Psalm 87.
description:
Fr. Mike clarifies some questions surrounding the Tribe of Levi and talks about what it means to be held to a higher standard as a leader in your community. Numbers 3, Deuteronomy 3, and Psalm 87.
For the complete reading plan, visit ascensionpress.com/bibleinayear.
